messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space being cold, a pack of [REDACTED] have migrated into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a horde of wire eating mammals have stampeded into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: IAN IS DEAD A MOMENT OF SILENCE PLEASE

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: REVING IAN IS PRIORITY NUMBER ONE

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Mike Fortress XIII, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Quarter Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Mike Fortress XIII door subroutines. Severity level of 2. Recommend station AI involvement.
